participant_abstract.sent: The meeting offered to each participant to do a presentation on their views on the remote control.
Design requirements were discussed and some problems were also discussed.
Each of the participants had the opportunity to present their opinion and to make propositions.
The work that still has to be done has been dispatched between the participants, according to their function.
Some questions are still opened to discussions, but the overall meeting was constructive.

participant_actions.sent: Presentation by each member of the team, according to their job of the proposition for the remote control Discussion about the functionalities and the overall look of the remote control.

participant_decisions.sent: It was decided to create a fancy, easy-to-use remote control.
The functions has to be easily accessible, with as few buttons as possible.

David Jordan = User interface designer ( sophisticated functions, powerfull and easy-to-use Baba = Industrial designer proposed to use the international standards in the sign choice: everyone will be able to understand these signs and it will be more intuitive.
The industrial designer proposed to use the infrared technology: only 8euros per remote control to use this technology, and to have a wireless remote control.

Florent Monay = Market expert: the remote control has to look fancy (75% of users find it ugly), to be very simple to use, and take care of the health of people as some functions are used intensively (zapping).
The choice of the colour for the remote control has to be the company colour.
The remote control must be associated to be company, through it look and also through the slogan company.
It is why it has been decided to create a fancy and fashion remote control with all the basic functions to interact with a television.

participant_problems.sent: The problem of the ease of use of the remote control and the fact that it has to be powerful has been discussed.
The question of the wireless or not wireless remote control is still opened to further discussions.

The problem of the appearance of the remote control has to be taken into account: proposition of a yellow line on the remote control, as the choice of a personal colour will increase the price of the remote control.
